title: [Medicine] US dental patients are taking home far fewer opioid painkillers now than a few years ago, but the pandemic slowed the decline greatly. American dentists and oral surgeons were still prescribing opioids in late 2022 at four times the rate of British dentists in 2016.

[Medicine] Researchers have shed valuable light on the mechanism of a key protein that regulates the plasticity and function of the hippocampus, a key brain region involved in memory and learning, and that decreases with age in mice and it could potentially be targeted in age-related disorders
